amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete language that permits the States to eliminate Medicaid funding of abortions in cases of rape, incest, or where the life of the mother is endangered.
amendment.purpose: An amendment not preprinted in the Congressional Record, to strike language that permits the States to eliminate Medicaid funding of abortions in cases of rape, incest, or where the life of the mother is endangered.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kolbe amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 206 - 215 (Roll no. 619).
